About

Memory games can be played to assist in the development of many brain functions, including but not limited to, attention, concentration, focus, and short-term memory. Memory games make individuals think about their choices and allow them to use critcal thinking. This can help develop their attention to detail. Short-term memory is a key to playing memory games and playing them often will imrpove this function. Along with an improved short-term memory, one's long term memory can also be improved. Memory games help boost the short-term memory and allow players to think critically of their next move when playing a game.
